## filterDeep() function

树过滤函数, 可用于过滤Array和NodeList类型的数据

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function filterDeep<V>(
  tree: ArrayLike<V>,
  predicate: (
    val: V,
    index: number,
    currentArr: ArrayLike<V>,
    tree: ArrayLike<V>,
    parent: V | null,
    level: number
  ) => boolean | void,
  options?: {
    childField?: string;
    reverse?: boolean;
    breadthFirst?: boolean;
    isDomNode?: boolean;
  }
): V[];
```
